markdown:
**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 258 **Traditions** [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) **Range** 500 feet **Area** 60-foot [burst](/Rules.aspx?ID=2385) **Defense** Reflex --- A powerful globe of chilling moonlight explodes in the area, dealing 8d10 [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) damage to all creatures in the area, plus an additional 8d10 [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509) damage to [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722) creatures. Moonburst’s cold damage is [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2920) damage for the purposes of [weaknesses, resistances, and the like](/Rules.aspx?ID=2312). Each creature and object in the area must attempt a Reflex save. **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature takes half damage.
**Failure** The creature takes full damage.
**Critical Failure** The creature takes full damage and becomes [blinded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=59) permanently. If the globe overlaps with an area of magical [darkness](/Rules.aspx?ID=2404), _moonburst_ attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=2250) the darkness effect. --- **Heightened (+1)** The [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) damage increases by 1d10, and the [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509) damage against [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722) increases by 1d10.
name: Moonburst

<summary>
A powerful globe of chilling moonlight explodes in the area, dealing 8d10 [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) damage to all creatures in the area, plus an additional 8d10 [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509) damage to [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722) creatures.
</summary>
summary: A powerful globe of chilling moonlight explodes in the area, dealing 8d10  cold  damage to all creatures in the area, plus an additional 8d10  vitality  damage to  undead  creatures.
summary_markdown: A powerful globe of chilling moonlight explodes in the area, dealing 8d10 [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=555) damage to all creatures in the area, plus an additional 8d10 [vitality](/Traits.aspx?ID=509) damage to [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=722) creatures.
text: Moonburst Two Actions Source Divine Mysteries pg. 258 Traditions Divine, Primal Range 500 feet Area 60-foot burst Defense Reflex --- A powerful globe of chilling moonlight explodes in the area, dealing 8d10 cold damage to all creatures in the area, plus an additional 8d10 vitality damage to undead creatures. Moonburst’s cold damage is silver damage for the purposes of weaknesses, resistances, and the like. Each creature and object in the area must attempt a Reflex save. Critical Success The creature is unaffected. Success The creature takes half damage. Failure The creature takes full damage. Critical Failure The creature takes full damage and becomes blinded permanently. If the globe overlaps with an area of magical darkness, moonburst attempts to counteract the darkness effect. --- Heightened (+1) The cold damage increases by 1d10, and the vitality damage against undead increases by 1d10.
